author: UltPanda
install_msg: Thank you for installing the Kaiju #8 Defense Force cog! Prepare to defend humanity against kaiju threats and potentially awaken your own kaiju powers. Use `[p]help df` to see all available commands.
name: Kaiju8Game
short: A Kaiju #8 themed Defense Force game cog
description: This cog brings the world of Kaiju #8 to your Discord server. Join the Defense Force, battle kaiju, gather resources, conduct research, and potentially discover your hidden kaiju powers!
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores user data including Defense Force rank, stats, resources, research contributions, and kaiju compatibility. Users can delete their data at any time using the appropriate command.
